title: 25 Must-Try AI Prompts for Product Managers in Emerging Markets
description: Unlock the power of generative AI with 25 tailored prompts for product managers in emerging markets. From roadmapping with Gemini to ideation with Grok, learn how I used these prompts to drive 160% revenue growth in Bangladesh SaaS projects.

author.name: Atiq Israk
author.bio: Generative AI Product Manager at Ether Technologies | Built NAVBOT & MAVE CMS AI integrations | Driving 160% revenue growth through AI in SaaS & FinTech | Dhaka, Bangladesh

content.introduction: Generative AI tools like Grok, Perplexity, and Gemini are game-changers for product managers, especially in emerging markets where resources are tight. As a PM in Bangladesh, I used tailored prompts to boost efficiency in MAVE CMS and NAVBOT, achieving 160% revenue growth. Here are 25 must-try prompts to streamline your PM workflows in 2025.

sections.heading: Why Prompts Matter for PMs in Emerging Markets
sections.body: In regions like South Asia, low-bandwidth and cost constraints demand efficient AI use. Prompts help PMs extract maximum value from tools like ChatGPT. For example, my NAVBOT project used prompts to automate CRM, cutting response times by 35%.

items: Ideation: Generate feature ideas for SaaS products.
Research: Analyze markets with Perplexity in low-data settings.
Automation: Draft PRDs using Gemini for speed.

images.caption: Powerful AI prompts to enhance product management workflows

sections.heading: 25 Essential AI Prompts
sections.body: These prompts are tested in my projects and optimized for PM tasks in emerging markets.

items: Grok: 'Generate 10 feature ideas for a FinTech app targeting rural users.'
Perplexity: 'Summarize competitor strategies for SaaS CMS in South Asia.'
ChatGPT: 'Draft a PRD for an AI chatbot with 3 user stories.'
Gemini: 'Create a 3-month roadmap for a low-budget e-commerce platform.'
[... 21 more prompts for ideation, testing, stakeholder alignment]

faqs.question: How do I craft effective AI prompts for PM tasks?
faqs.answer: Be specific and context-rich. For example, my MAVE LMS prompts included user personas, leading to 40% higher course completion.

faqs.question: Which AI tool is best for emerging market PMs?
faqs.answer: Perplexity excels for research in low-bandwidth areas; Grok is great for creative ideation.
